Function for generating messy data

Source: R/messy_data.R
messy_data.Rd

Function for generating messy data

messy_data(n = 20)

Arguments

n

the number of cases to generate

Value

a data frame with "messy" data

Examples

messy_data(n = 5)
#>      'ID Date of Onset. DisCharge.. GENDER_  Épi.Case_définition
#> 1 myiegy     2018-01-08  18/01/2018   Female          Not.a.Case
#> 2 jytfaw     2018-01-06  16/01/2018     MALE           confirmed
#> 3 fohjkp     2018-01-05  15/01/2018   FEMALE            probable
#> 4 mlgmxt     2018-01-02  12/01/2018     MALE           Confirmed
#> 5 ajpqwu     2018-01-05  15/01/2018     MALE            PROBABLE
#>       messy/dates      lat      lon
#> 1      2018-10-18 13.06511 47.58563
#> 2      2018_10_17 13.92258 47.48165
#> 3      01-12-2001 15.76280 47.31598
#> 4 // 24//12//1989 12.16705 47.11435
#> 5      2018 10 19 14.36189 48.04924
messy_data()
#>       'ID Date of Onset. DisCharge.. GENDER_  Épi.Case_définition
#> 1  zdrodb     2018-01-09  19/01/2018     MALE          Not.a.Case
